example.description: This example deletes the specified tag from the specified resource, regardless of the tag value. The syntax used by this example requires PowerShell version 3 or later.
This example deletes the specified tag from the specified resource, but only if the tag value matches. The syntax used by this example requires PowerShell version 3 or later.

example.code:
PS C:\> $tag = New-Object Amazon.EC2.Model.Tag PS C:\> $tag.Key = "myTag"
PS C:\> Remove-EC2Tag -Resource i-12345678 -Tag $tag -Force
